record.title: U.S. TROOP READINESS, VETERANS' HEALTH, AND IRAQ ACCOUNTABILITY ACT, 2007--Continued

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the substitute amendment be agreed to, the bill, as amended, be considered as original text for the purpose of further amendments, and that no points of order be considered waived by virtue of this agreement; further, that the pending Cochran amendment remain in order, notwithstanding this agreement.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I send a cloture motion to the desk.

record.chair: The cloture motion having been presented under rule XXII, the Chair directs the clerk to read the motion.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the live quorum under rule XXII be waived.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
